songs.title: Black Magic (Live at the BRIT Awards 2016)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Huh
Huh
Huh
Black magic
Black magic
Black magic
Black

[Verse 1: Perrie Edwards & Jade Thirlwall]
Is your lover playing on your side? (Huh, huh)
Said he loves ya, but he ain't got time (Huh, huh)
(Hey) Here’s the answer, come and get it (Huh, huh)
At a knocked down (Huh) price (Huh)
Full of honey just to make him sweet
Crystal balling just to help him see
What he's been missing, so come and get it
While you've still got time (Hey!)

[Pre-Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Get your boy on his knees
And repeat after me, say

[Chorus: All & Jesy Nelson]
Take a sip of my secret potion
I’ll make you fall in love
For a spell that can't be broken
One drop should be enough
Boy, you belong to me
I've got the recipe
And it's called black magic
(And it's called black magic, yeah)
Take a sip of my secret potion (Huh)
One taste and you'll be mine (Huh)
It's a spell that can't be broken (Huh)
It’ll keep you up all night (Huh)
Boy, you belong to me (Huh)
I’ve got the recipe (Huh)
And it's called black magic (Huh)
(And it’s called black magic, yeah) (Huh)

[Verse 2: Jesy Nelson]
If you're lookin' for Mister Right (Huh)
Need that magic to (Huh) change him over night (Huh)
Here's the answer (Huh), come and get it
While you’ve still got time (Hey!)

[Pre-Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
(Huh) Boy on his knees
And repeat after me, say, yeah, yeah

[Chorus: All & Jesy Nelson]
Take a sip of my secret potion
I'll make you fall in love
For a spell that can't be broken
One drop should be enough
Boy, you belong to me
I've got the recipe
And it's called black magic
(And it's called black magic, yeah)
Take a sip of my secret potion (Huh)
One taste and you'll be mine
It's a spell that can't be broken (Huh)
It'll keep you up all night
Boy, you belong to me (Huh)
I've got the recipe
And it's called black magic (Huh)
(And it's called black magic, yeah) (Huh)

[Bridge]
All the girls on the block knocking at my door
Wanna know what it is, make the boys want more
All the girls on the block knocking at my door
Wanna know what it is, make the boys want more

[Beat switch]
[Dance breakdown]

[Chorus: Perrie Edwards + Leigh-Anne Pinnock, All & Jade Thirlwall]
And it's called black magic
Take a sip of my secret potion (Oh, woah)
One taste and you'll be mine (Be mine)
It's a spell that can't be broken
It'll keep you up all night (Oh, woah)
Boy, you belong to me (Belong to me)
I've got the recipe
And it's called black magic (Huh)
(And it's called, and it's called black magic)

[Outro: Perrie Edwards, All & Jade Thirlwall]
(Woah, yeah, yeah) Falling in love (Huh), falling in love (Huh)
(Yeah, yeah, yeah) Falling in love (Hey!) (Huh), falling in love (Hey!) (Huh)
Falling in love (Huh) (Ohh, ehh), falling in love
Falling in—, falling in— (Huh), falling in love
